name: ***SUMMER IN SYDNEY***FUN IN THE SUN TOUR***SNORKELLING FOR BEGINNERS, FERRY RIDE, BUSH WALK AND BBQ
description: The best fun to have in Sydney this Summer!  In one amazing afternoon you will embark on a ferry trip to beautiful Shelly beach, 15 minutes walk from the iconic Manly beachside wharf.  Escape the crowds at the larger beaches and enjoy a relaxing and intimate afternoon snorkelling, swimming, tanning, BBQ-ing, bushwalking and indulging in seaside fish & chips in the shade in a small group of six or so travellers.  Snorkelling gear, refreshments, an underwater camera (I will even email the pics to you after the tour has finished!) and ferry travel fare are included. The waters at Shelly beach are very shallow with depths ranging from 2 to 6 metres - this makes it perfect for beginners.! I am a marine biology student with qualifications in water safety and have plenty of experience should you feel hesitant to partake.  Unlike a lot of beach-trips, mine includes a bush walk around the area and children ages 6 onward are welcome.  You don't need to go to Queensland to see some of Australia's most beautiful Marine life, nor do you need to pay scads of money to learn about Sydney's coastline heritage, punt across the city for the freshest fish, coldest beer or best company - it's all here!
